title: go fails to build on 32bit linux
body:
by **Yuvwah**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. $GOROOT/src/all.bash

What is the expected output?
blah blah X known errors, 0 unexpected errors blah

What do you see instead?

--- cd pkg
cd archive/tar && gomake test
make[1]: Entering directory `/home/caoboi/aur/go/src/pkg/archive/tar'
gotest
/usr/bin/gotest: line 26: /home/jesusaur/aur/go/src/Make.386: No such file or directory
missing $O - maybe no Make.$GOARCH?

Which operating system are you using?
GOARCH=386
GOOS=linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
f7e692dc29b0 tip

Please provide any additional information below.
I don't think its relevant, but GOBIN is not a subdirectory of GOROOT
